This category could have also been called crafting, gifting, or tied into the reuse cateogry. Creating encompasses all of the items that we can make. Whether this be for gifting, for our own use, or just other projects that we can become immersed in, creating plays a pivotal role in living sustainably. By calling upon creativity, we can utilize this attribute to solve climate issues and to adapt our daily practices.
